activities: Va Bici collects personal information to enable customers to reserve/rent a bicycle in advance of their arrival as well as to arrange for bicycle tours, whether as an individual or a group.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: The only personal data collected by Va Bici is for billing and credit card processing only:  name, address, credit card information (collected but not stored)
recoursemech: Va Bici agrees to cooperate and comply with the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate all unresolved complaints, regardless of the type of data involved.
